letter.on_pick_up:
You pick up the letter. It reads:
Dear Traveller,
I hope you like the Staiti, we have many faithful followers there.
One of them left a little present for you at the Cemetery. Remember
that offence is not everything during war, think about the defence
as well.

Be good,
A.
